title: Mini-Ep 256: Dear Diary
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 256: Dear Diary
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets her husband interested in the show Below Deck and Doree engages in productive procrastination by creating a 6-week workout calendar. Then, listeners send in their support for the listener struggling with a relationship with their step-mom, as...
description:
Kate gets her husband interested in the show Below Deck and Doree engages in productive procrastination by creating a 6-week workout calendar. Then, listeners send in their support for the listener struggling with a relationship with their step-mom, ask how to get their spouse to wash their face more often, and wonder what to do with cringy, old journals and writing. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
